overview: A middle-class Italian family is tore apart when the father meets an old flame, the mother—a frustrated onetime actress—auditions for a play, their insecure son tries to make friends through drugs, and their underaged daughter—who has already figured out how to use sex to her advantage—does what she does best to appear on TV.
cast: Fabrizio Bentivoglio|Laura Morante|Monica Bellucci|Silvio Muccino|Nicoletta Romanoff
